options.name: blacklist
options.description: Contains all commands related to blacklisted words and expressions.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a regular expression to the list of blacklisted words.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a regular expression to the list of blacklisted words.

options.name: index
options.description:
The index of a blacklisted expression in the database. Starting from 0.
Example: 1

options.name: reddit
options.description: Contains all commands related to subreddit feeds.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a subreddit feed to the text channel.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a subreddit feed from the current text channel.

options.name: index
options.description:
The index of a subreddit name in the database. Starting from 0.
Example: 1

options.name: info
options.description: List all registered Subreddit feeds of the current text channel.

options.name: reddit_legacy
options.description: Contains all commands related to subreddit feeds.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a subreddit feed from the current text channel.

options.name: index
options.description:
The index of a subreddit name in the database. Starting from 0.
Example: 1

options.name: info
options.description: List all registered Subreddit feeds of the current text channel.
